Autonomous Endpoint Management
extends the XEM platform to transform how IT and security teams execute changes safely in their environment â€“ at scale, with confidence, and in real time.
Real-time cloud intelligence
Measure and analyze even the smallest effect of change on endpoints to confidently predict the impact of endpoint change in real time.
Automation and orchestration
Scale and extend the value of precious expertise by capturing and designing dynamic, reusable automations that span IT and security operations use cases.
Deployment templates and rings
Minimize disruptions by rolling out endpoint change to match the rhythm of the business.
AEM is designed to always put the user in control of all aspects of the autonomous systems.
